categories: Category:Members of the Spice Runners of Kijimi

nodes.text: Tomasso was a male individual who was a high-ranking member of the criminal gang known as the Spice Runners of Kijimi. However, he was eventually accused of becoming an informant passing information on to the New Republic, and was killed by the gang's leader, Zeva Bliss. In truth, he had been framed by the New Republic Security Bureau officer Sela Trune, as part of her vengeful campaign against Bliss and the gang.
